item.title: About
item.description:
About Me

Senior Research Engineer

  • Mobile: +86 13416661681
  • Email: 13416661681@163.com, liya.liang.zhang@gmail.com
  • Google Scholar
  • LinkedIn

Welcome to my personal website! Here you can find information about my research, publications, teaching, talks, and more.

Education

    Doctor of Philosophy in Electrical and Computer Engineering

    Thesis title: Learning-Based Approaches for Next-Generation Intelligent Networks

item.title: Publications
item.description:
Publications

Selected Publications

  • L. Zhang, A. Celik, S. Dang and B. Shihada, â€œEnergy-Efficient Trajectory Optimization for UAV-Assisted IoT Networksâ€ in IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing, vol. 21, no. 12, pp. 4323-4337, 1 Dec. 2022 (one of the fifty most popular papers of TMC).
  • L. Zhang, C. Zhang and B. Shihada, â€œEfficient Wireless Traffic Prediction at the Edge: A Federated Meta-Learning Approachâ€ in IEEE Communications Letters, vol. 26, no. 7, pp. 1573-1577, Jul. 2022.
  • L. Zhang, C. Zhang, S. Dang and B. Shihada, â€œLessons from the Commercial Failure of Project Loon for 6G Research Roadmap Designâ€ in Frontiers in Communications and Networks, vol. 3, 2022.
  • L. Zhang, W. Abderrahim and B. Shihada, â€œHeterogeneous Traffic Offloading in Space-Air-Ground Integrated Networksâ€ in IEEE Access, vol. 9, pp. 165462-165475, Dec. 2021.
  • L. Zhang, G. Ma, A. Al-Ghadhban, S. Dang and B. Shihada, â€œICAQ: Adaptive QoS System for 5G and Beyond Applicationsâ€ in IEEE ICCT, Nanning, China, 2020.
  • L. Bai, L. Zhang*, G. Zhang, L. Zhang, P Medagliani, and S. Martin, â€œA Distributed Congestion Mitigation Mechanism Based on Neighboring Nodes Traffic Steeringâ€ International Conference on Network of the Future, Izmir, Turkey, 2023.
  • X. Rao, H. Wang, L. Zhang, J. Li, S. Shang, P. Han, â€œFOGS: First-Order Gradient Supervision with Learning-based Graph for Traffic Flow Forecastingâ€ in IJCAI, Messe Wien, Vienna, Austria, 2022.
  • Y. Xie, W. Pei, D. Guo, L. Zhang, H. Zhang, X. Guo, X. Xing, X. Yang, F. Wang, Q. Gui, Y. Wang, H. Chen, â€œImproving adhesion strength between layers of an implantable parylene-C electrodeâ€ in Sensors and Actuators A: Physical, vol. 260, pp. 117-123, 2017.
  • F. Wang, D. Guo, Y. Xie, L. Zhang, W. Pei, H. Chen, â€œAn implantable optrode composed of fiber and flexible thin-film electrodeâ€ in Optoelectronics Letters, vol. 14, no. 4, pp. 271-275, 2018.
  • C. Zhang, G. Ma, L. Zhang, and B. Shihada, â€œGraph Convolutional Networks Empowered Origin-Destination Learning for Urban Traffic Predictionâ€ CAAI Transactions on Intelligence Technology.

Full Publication List

See my Google Scholar for a complete list.
